app.title: Moddable One Animations
app.author: Lizzie Prader
app.description:
Displays a series of eye-catching animations. This app was designed to show off the capabilities of Moddable One, but it runs on many other devices too.

You can read more about this app in the blog post Animations on a Display Powered by a $1 Wi-Fi Controller.

app.title: Color Picker
app.author: Lizzie Prader
app.description:
Displays a color wheel that allows the user to select a color. This color wheel is built using content objects from the Piu user interface framework and packaged as a module, making it easy to incorporate into any project built using Piu.

You can read more about this app in the blog post A Color Picker for Microcontrollers.

app.title: Giphy
app.author: Lizzie Prader
app.description:
Downloads and displays animated GIFs from Giphy.

You can read more about this app in the blog post Downloading and Displaying Animated GIFs on an ESP32.

app.title: PNG Display
app.author: Peter Hoddie
app.description:
Allows you use the curl command line tool to push PNG images to the display rather than changing the code. This app was created for use by user interface designers.

You can read more about this app in the blog post Pushing PNG Images to a Display.
